address: 530 B Street Suite 1310, San Diego, CA 92101
valueProp: At Price Pelletier, LLP we handle complex, high stakes civil litigation – specializing in general/commercial defense and transportation cases. Experienced trial lawyers with decades of courtroom experience, we are relentless in our approach and determined to outwork the other side time and again.
